lead: Analyze the fictitious customer service emails and identify the errors by clicking directly on the incorrect phrases.

completion.title: Congratulations!
completion.message: You found all errors in this email!

emails.corpo: Dear Jo√£o, Thank you for contacting us. Regarding your request to exchange the product purchased in our physical store, we inform you that you have a guaranteed legal right to exchange within 7 working days. Please, send the product to our technical assistance so we can proceed. Sincerely, SAC Team

1.texto: you have a guaranteed legal right to exchange
1.explicacao: The exchange of a product WITHOUT DEFECT in a physical store is a COMMERCIAL POLICY (store courtesy), not a right guaranteed by law. The CDC only mandates exchange in case of defect.

2.explicacao: When applicable (online purchases), the Right of Repentance period is 7 CALENDAR days, not working days.

3.texto: send the product to our technical assistance
3.explicacao: A product WITHOUT DEFECT should not be sent to technical assistance. Technical assistance is for repairing products WITH DEFECTS.

emails.corpo: Dear Maria, We received your request to withdraw from the purchase made in our physical store last week. We inform you that you can exercise the right of repentance normally. Upon returning the product, we will refund 80% of the amount paid. We remind you that after the return, there will be no further possibility of complaining about the product. Sincerely, SAC Team

1.texto: you can exercise the right of repentance
1.explicacao: The Right of Repentance (7 days) only applies to ONLINE purchases or those made outside the commercial establishment. It does NOT apply to purchases in physical stores.

2.texto: we will refund 80% of the amount paid
2.explicacao: When repentance is applicable, the refund must be FULL (100%), including shipping. It can never be partial.

3.texto: after the return, there will be no further possibility of complaining about the product
3.explicacao: The customer always retains the right to complain about HIDDEN DEFECTS (defects that appear later), even after previous returns or exchanges.

emails.corpo: Dear Carlos, We apologize for the inconvenience with your home appliance. According to the Consumer Protection Code, you have up to 15 days to resolve the problem through technical assistance. If the problem is not solved within this period, we will only offer a proportional abatement in the value. Please proceed to the brand's authorized technical assistance for evaluation. Sincerely, SAC Team

1.texto: you have up to 15 days to resolve the problem through technical assistance
1.explicacao: The correct deadline is 30 DAYS for the supplier to resolve the defect via technical assistance, not 15 days.

2.texto: we will only offer a proportional abatement in the value
2.explicacao: After 30 days without a solution, the customer has THREE options: product exchange, proportional abatement, OR full refund. Not just one option.

emails.corpo: Dear Ana, Regarding your request to exchange the food product, we inform you that you can return the product to any store in our chain. To speed up the process, it is not necessary to bring the tax coupon. Just bring the product. After analysis, we will exchange it for any product of your choice of the same value. Sincerely, SAC Team

1.texto: you can return the product to any store in our chain
1.explicacao: Food products must be taken to the STORE WHERE THE PURCHASE WAS MADE, along with the tax coupon, for management evaluation.

2.texto: it is not necessary to bring the tax coupon
2.explicacao: The TAX COUPON IS MANDATORY to validate the purchase and proceed with any complaint or product exchange.

3.texto: we will exchange it for any product of your choice of the same value
3.explicacao: The exchange of food products only occurs when the product is UNFIT FOR CONSUMPTION, not due to customer preference. Reason, brand, and batch must be evaluated.
